description:
4MLinux 47.0 Linux distribution is now available for download with support for installing on virtual KVM block devices and other changes. Here's what's new!

The post 4MLinux 47.0 Released with Installation Support for Virtual (KVM) Block Devices appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: 4MLinux 47.0 Released with Installation Support for Virtual (KVM) Block Devices
